name: CreateCandidateReferral
description:
Creates a candidate referral in the system.

Use this tool to create a referral for a candidate, typically when hiring or recommending someone for a position. Requires the `candidatesWrite` permission.

parameters.name: candidate_referral_details
parameters.description: JSON object with candidate referral details, including id, creditedToUserId, fieldSubmissions, and createdAt.

value.description:
The value depends on the field type:
- Most fields: A primitive value (string, number, boolean)
- Job field: An object with { title: job.title, value: job.id }
- Location field: An object with the following properties: `{ country: "USA", city: "San Francisco", region: "California" }`. You may provide any combination of these properties and we will attempt to geocode the location. For best results, provide all three properties.
